readable.title: 2632111399_b3c1630f8e
readable.content: A boy catcher in a helmet , stretching out his gloved hand for a catch . A catcher in a red and white uniform plays at a baseball game . A catcher with a red shirt is standing in the dirt with his glove held out . A child catcher reaching out his mitt to catch a ball . The boy is bending down ready to catch the ball .
